Mendokusai

Tartarus

Poker

21 Feb 2018

I've been playing poker a little bit over the past few days, and things are coming back to me. I am enjoying it, and it feels very different to how it did two months ago. Now I just need to work out how to sustain this feeling, and work on improving my game.
